website_summaries.verdict: The best smart padlock designed for mailboxes and other areas to unlock with a simple barcode.
pros: Padlock uses a unique barcode that can be shared with friends or delivery services to unlock automatically
Comes with a monitoring app to receive notifications
cons: The padlock takes a long time to lock securely

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The technology concept is great. The lock works perfectly. Problem is carriers don't use it and still leave packages on the porch. BoxLock says customer has to call all the carrier customer service offices to have them instruct the drivers to use it. Shouldn't have to do that - they should have this all worked out so it is used and not an inconvenience for their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Frank M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work have to scan about 8 inches away to make it work
customer_reviews.text: Have to scan bar code about 8 inches away and even that it still wont work beeps twice seems like a waste of money and these amazon drives dont bother to use it as well they leave the packages on the porch i have a big sign saying to leave my packages in the box and they ignore that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lock
customer_reviews.text: The lock works great and support is outstanding (Boxlock) but drivers especial this time of year (April 2020) have never seen this lock. One company driver"s (Amazon) has rung my doorbell and I was able to teach the way to open the lock but some companies (Fed?? and Up?) just throw the package from Amazon and run. But you can notices when a package has been left in the box. The best drivers are Amazon and I don't worry about porch pirates. It would be nice if the price of the lock was a little bit better but still worth it in the long run!
customer_reviews.author: TSgt LGN

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea ! Great Product !
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product! Easy set up and easy to use. Delivery driver feedback is positive which makes me feel better about package delivery. No more worries about porch pirates!
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: Won't connect to my wifi
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning this. It won't connect to my wifi. Says "invalid password". I'm certain I've given it the correct password. Just to be sure, I even changed my wifi password, reconnected all my devices to make sure the new password was correct and working, but the BoxLock still says "invalid password". Multiple attempts to contact their support have failed, they must keep banking hours or something. I was a little leery about a lock that's so dependent on internet connectivity. My internet is not the most reliable, but I can't even make it past the first setup step. Maybe if it had a bluetooth/offline mode...?
customer_reviews.author: Kitzel Hoover

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool!! Now I know my packages are safe. Alerted to when they are delivered on my phone. My first delivery came without a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: Karma Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Protect Your Deliveries with the BoxLock
customer_reviews.text: This a fantastic prevention method for one to take to protect from having package thieves from stealing packages. This item pairs up with the actual BoxLock Box, where packages are securely placed via using the BoxLock to scan the incoming package and unlocking the lock to allow the courier to place the package into your box. Then once the courier locks your BoxLock, it’ll send you a push notification stating package securely received. Now of course you’ll have to download and install the BoxLock app and register your account. Then pair the app to your BoxLock via Bluetooth/WiFi. This is how you’ll will receive package secured delivery notifications.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Thurow

customer_reviews.title: The best of its kind
customer_reviews.text: Paired with a lockbox, this solution lets USPS, FedEx, UPS and Amazon scan to open the lock, deposits the package and lock it up. It works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Al Boss

customer_reviews.title: Great idea that will work one day
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea and it would work great if any of the delivery drives knew how to use it or tried to use it. I have had drivers place the delivery on the box and next to the box. I came home during one delivery and the driver told me he didn’t know how to use it. I showed him how to use it but he isn’t the only driver. I have had one delivery placed in my delivery box in three months. Hopefully it gets better. I even put a large set of directions on the top of the container and they still don’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bull B

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Lock
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for my only because my mailbox is to far away from my home. Could not connect to the wifi. Good quality lock very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock. Nobody uses it!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. It works exactly as described. The problem is that nobody uses it. I have a ring camera and I watch delivery people (Amazon, UPS and FedEx) walk up to the door and drop the package right next to the box with the lock on it - yes I DO have the delivery instructions included to explain the box lock and request it to be used. I see other deliver staff look at the lock, try pressing the button and then just give up and drop the parcel.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: Way more versatile than expected
customer_reviews.text: This purchase is turning out to be far more versatile than first thought. Besides Amazon deliveries we are able to use it with family and friends when they need to drop off or pick up things from us when we’re not home as this BoxLock allows us to create a barcode we can sms or watsapp to others to gain access. Surprised trucking companies have not picked up on this product yet as well .
customer_reviews.author: Paul Good

customer_reviews.title: Find a better way to protect your packages.
customer_reviews.text: Apparently, most delivery drivers either don't know what the box-lock is, how to use it, or will take the time to use it. I had assumed, when I bought the lock and then posted the sign, that the manufacturer would have at least notified the various carriers of what the lock was for and how to use it. That was a dumb assumption on my part and this has proven a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Henry J.

customer_reviews.title: It's an New concept
customer_reviews.text: Not jet I'm trying to understand how it works, I don't have my drop box jet coming soon. Some tracking numbers I put others didn't it'smy fault, so untill I get a pretty good idea I won't comment one way or the other.
customer_reviews.author: cesar villegas

customer_reviews.title: Does not work. Delivery could not unlock it by using the tracking number scanner
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is very good. The installation process is easy and intuitive. The lock looks durable and the build quality is good. HOWEVER, the lock could not be unlocked by delivery even I correctly entered tracking numbers into the app. Based on my observation via my video doorbell, UPS and FedEx usually just ignore it and put my packages aside from the delivery box. Only TBA (Amazon) delivery tried using it a couple of times but they never successfully unlocked it so now they started ignoring it. The master code and remote unlocking work good but the tracking number scanning. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic - highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This lock has been great! I no longer have boxes by my front door. Very easy to set up as well.
customer_reviews.author: DMO

customer_reviews.title: BoxLock is must-have gadget in every modern home.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite heavy-duty smart gadget! I truly love BoxLock. It solves a real and forever growing problem ( Porch Pirates). Pros: It’s obviously WiFi-connected. It is specifically designed to safeguard your home deliveries. Compatible with the Big 4 Carriers: Amazon, FedEx, UPS & USPS I love that it locks automatically & securely syncs the latest package delivery information over Wi-Fi while working with any locking storage container Cons: Getting 100% of the Big 4 Carrier & Delivery Workforce will take some time. Not sure if it will last a couple of extremely cold Northeast Winters.
customer_reviews.author: JL T.

customer_reviews.title: The idea is good...
customer_reviews.text: I've had the box lock for 1 week and I haven't had the chance to see how well it works because so many carriers are unaware of it and the step 2 delivery box. I have updated my delivery preferences and still no carrier has followed them. I think the makers of the box lock and step 2 delivery box should form a relationship with all the carriers and get them to add it as a preference.
customer_reviews.author: TNP

customer_reviews.title: Advanced Technology that Delivers Peace of Mind!
customer_reviews.text: I love the peace of mind that BoxLock gives me when I have a package delivered while I am away. The lock itself is incredibly sturdy and the bright yellow color makes it easier for delivery drivers to find. While a few of our drivers were not quite as familiar with the product, we quickly showed them how easy it was to operate and now they love the convenience of it. The app is also very easy to use. BoxLock is an incredibly simple idea that is ahead of its time, but will soon be the norm. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly W

customer_reviews.title: I love it, the post man loves it, the whole post office loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Computer Repair business and do a lot of house calls so my door is locked alot of times when customer packages are supposed to be delivered. It works great! The mail man lived it so much he told the rest of the staff at the post office to come check it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must be very near wifi modem
customer_reviews.text: This lock did not work because the package box is located too far from the wifi modem. I returned it and receipt was acknowledged. However, I have still not received credit to my Amazon account eleven days later. I must pay for it already and then wait until Amazon actually applies the credit to my account that it said it did both three weeks ago when I sent it back and eleven days ago when they acknowledged receipt of it. Very poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not a Full Product
customer_reviews.text: The postperson uses it 1/7 times. One MAJOR bummer with this device is that you can only have one email connected to it. I talked to customer support and they recommended creating a shared email, but then we would have to forward all of our package notifications, which is a lot of overhead. It is a really cool idea, but they are just not there yet. I can't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: BoxLock means my deliveries can "Just say no" to porch pirates
customer_reviews.text: BoxLock seriously provides me with some much needed peace of mind with respect to my deliveries. After being the victim of porch pirates for years, I can - FINALLY - rest easy knowing that all of my deliveries will not 'mysteriously' walk off before I can get home, and bring them inside. Even though I'm home much more now than ever, it's still great to know that there's something there in the event I'm out of town on vacation, or anything for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: marcuscan

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but not one package made it in.
customer_reviews.text: Spent almost a hundred dollars on this. It lasted less than 6 months was told by Amazon can only return for 60 days and not once was a package able to be delivered into my package box even with the direction card. Most drivers Mark the packages delivered as they leave the truck so they can't open the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McGee

customer_reviews.title: Protection from the porch pirates.
customer_reviews.text: A great product that is sometimes difficult to get delivery people to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence A.

customer_reviews.title: Box Lock!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to have for your parcels. I have peace of mind knowing my packages are safe in in the box lock until it arrive home to retrieve them.
customer_reviews.author: Eaglelady

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hpoing for
customer_reviews.text: The lock is slow to open, and often does not open at all, so busy carriers will not spend the time to make this lock open and my packages end up on the ground next to my box. The Bluetooth is just about worthless. Will not unlock from a bar-code on a cell phone if it is sunny out.
customer_reviews.author: Lucian Goodson

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to a common problem!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a high foot traffic area and receive multiple deliveries per week. It only took one package to go missing to realize I needed to do something. This lock keeps my deliveries secure and provides peace of mind (priceless). Easy to setup and operate (my fedex and UPS drivers use it with every delivery!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package Delivery with Ease of Mind!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the BoxLock for packages on my front porch for a couple weeks now, and I love it! I was able to catch my UPS driver a couple days into using it as she was delivering a package, and she mentioned that she was getting used to seeing it more and more in the neighborhood! I ordered this because I'd had a few packages grow legs and walk off my porch, and so far with the BoxLock on my delivery box, all of my packages are accounted for!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer U.

customer_reviews.title: Ap is difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of difficulty using the ap on my android. I finally downloaded it to my chrome book, and it works okay. Also I have received several packages and downloaded the tracking information. NONE of the delivery companies will use the device. I even left the box unlocked and in one case even opened the box. The delivery companies, including Amazon, threw the package on the porch making no effort to use the box. The product is great but the carriers are not.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh C lark

customer_reviews.title: Won't connect to wifi!
customer_reviews.text: For what ever reason, I can not get the device to connect. And I notice some odd behavior from the app, when trying to connect tracking accounts. I'm not quite sure why, but I don't trust this company. And I can't, in good conscious, recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Mclain

customer_reviews.title: Dont Bother
customer_reviews.text: We tried repeatedly to make this thing work but it did not. Called for support...still did not. We were so excited about this product. Now we are so disappointed and out a ton of money. We are past the return window. Beware very short return window!
customer_reviews.author: Robin's Raves

customer_reviews.title: Cool but drivers don't use At All
customer_reviews.text: Cool product and works fairly well (little bit of a connectivity issue and it's 20 feet from a router. The main issue is that delivery drivers don't know how to use it and just put package on top the box. I've tried 3 different descriptions on my instructions and not one package in my box successfully.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan  Goldinger

customer_reviews.title: Delivery crews do not know how to operate
customer_reviews.text: Nice lock, great concept BUT apparently no one knows how to use, How can we get the delivery companies to know what to do? they leave the packages on top of the box. Unfortunately if it's not going to work I would rather return the lock and put a standard combo lock and provide the number to the shippers in the delivery instructions. Can anyone help?
customer_reviews.author: Hendrik DB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really useful security device that makes us feel confident that our packages are accounted for even when we aren’t home. Setup is simple and I love the ability to track my packages. I think our mail carrier appreciates it too!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Charging cord came Busted
customer_reviews.text: We got the lock and when we opened it (unfortunately not right away) the charging cord prong was busted off, leaving us unable to charge the lock. It's basically useless without the ability to charge it. We shortly realized that because we didn't open it immediately, we are now outside our return window; So we have a very expensive lock with no charger.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Waste of investment- carriers won’t use it.
customer_reviews.text: We live in a neighborhood with a lot of porch piracy. We were happy to see that major carriers were compatible with this. But, compatible doesn’t necessarily mean they will use it. No carrier will use this. They don’t even know what it is. Amazon won’t even use it and we got the box AND the lock from Amazon. Very disappointed. A total waste of money. I’d actually like my money back because I feel like this is a bit false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Great product / delivery golf need more training
customer_reviews.text: Love the product.... when I can get the delivery drivers to use it the right way.... almost had it totally working then we slipped I do not have the same team delivering to me each day..... but if you have same this works great
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This never worked for the UPS, USPS, FedEx or any amazon delivery. No one could get their head around it, and yes we did write explicit instructions on the box. We tried for as long as we could before giving up. I think Boxlock would have been happy for us to return the product, but as we bought it through amazon, our return window has closed. Amazon might be convenient, but it's not always the way to go. I now have a very expensive Christmas ornament.
customer_reviews.author: Ms KL Morrison-Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Great product if anyone bothered using it
customer_reviews.text: Great product but carriers don’t even bother trying to use it. They just leave packages on the porch
customer_reviews.author: Saverio M

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible lock. Scanner does not work and USPS driver could not use it. I barely got it to work after almost an hour of trying when I got home.
customer_reviews.author: BJONZEE

customer_reviews.title: Love the security of my BoxLock
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Mine is on a lockable bench on the front porch, plenty of room for multiple packages. I put "Scan to BoxLock" as the 1st line of my address. Amazon delivery people often ignore the request. I have taken to giving a "thumbs down" on delivery if they don't use the BoxLock!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a couple of months now and have had it used for a few deliveries per month. I get the most success with Amazon because they typically follow delivery instructions. I really love the app and like being able to get notified in one place about deliveries. Setup was also super simple.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great, but...
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Just wished Amazon, FedEx, UPS, and USPS delivery people would use it, despite delivery instructions and a big sign!
customer_reviews.author: Victor T.

customer_reviews.title: Courier didn’t use it
customer_reviews.text: The lockbox worked great... unfortunately the courier didn’t use it and left it in front of my door. I scanned the package and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon, Ups, Fed Ex do not know how to use and don't use
customer_reviews.text: The lock was a waste of money. They do not know how to use, don't use it. We even had to tell them, and we put in the notes. We have the sign hanging right above the box. We finally took the lock off and they are now learning to just put in the box. However, it is not locked.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Ugh
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Ahead of its time! No one has used it. Amazon delivery hasn’t tried to use it once even with us putting specific instructions to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Rusted/corroded in less than 2mos!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great concept but they're not there yet. My biggest compliant is that it has rusted in less than 2mos. Not really worth what you'll pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: Allen H

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and protects my packages
customer_reviews.text: I found it pretty easy to set up the box lock, and it’s nice to have the box set up to protect packages from the elements and passerby.
customer_reviews.author: Paint Scratcher

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy, and it's going to be great when we're traveling!!
customer_reviews.author: pov

customer_reviews.title: Delivery folks don’t know how to use it.
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as being a great lock, which it is, and also that the U.S. Postal employees, UPS, and FedEx delivery folks are familiar with it and know how to use it. No they don’t. I’ve had to train them all.
customer_reviews.author: Maude Church

customer_reviews.title: Box is secured at least
customer_reviews.text: Lock works great! Too bad the delivery people are either not familiar on how to use it or too lazy to learn how to scan my packages so they’re secured. Long story short my packages are still just thrown on the porch
customer_reviews.author: jason schultze

customer_reviews.title: The drivers need to know about it and how to head it
customer_reviews.text: It's safe but the drivers dont know what it is and how to used it I had to show one guy how to used the lock he left my package by the door
customer_reviews.author: clinton kelly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work and delivery people refuse to use it. A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Whetzel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It did not work as promised. I was highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

product_meta.title: BoxLock BoxLock001-1 Delivery Lock-Protect Packages from UPS, USPS, FedEx, and More, Yellow
product_meta.description: Style:BoxLockThe BoxLock BOXLOCK001-1 Package Delivery Lock is the first smart padlock designed to protect deliveries and it works with all major US carriers. It’s simple to use BoxLock. Your delivery driver simply grabs the BoxLock and presses the button on the top to scan the tracking number on your package. Only packages addressed to you and that are actually out for delivery that day will unlock this smart padlock. The driver opens the bin, places your package safely inside, closes the bin and locks the lock. Each time a package is scanned your BoxLock connects to your Wi-Fi to confirm whether or not it should open. Using the mobile application on Android or iOS, BoxLock users can open the lock or share access by texting or e-mailing barcodes to friends and family for one-time use, multiple users or specific dates. Using BoxLock's effortless tracking feature, BoxLock automatically collects tracking numbers from USPS, UPS, FedEx and for any packages being delivered to a household. BoxLock incorporates security enhancements, improved battery life and additional features to make it easy for drivers to use.
feature_bullets: CONVENIENT PROTECTION - Protect your deliveries from porch pirates and package thieves with Box Lock, the simple, convenient way to protect your package deliveries from all major carriers
SIMPLE DESIGN - Smart Padlock design works with a broad range of hasped storage containers, sheds, gates and doors.Shackle made from hardened steel to help resist unauthorized opening

EASY TO USE APP - Automatically collect and track packages from UPS, USPS, FedEx and in one place with the Box Lock mobile app, receive notifications when packages are securely delivered using Box Lock
SHAREABLE ACCESS CODES - Share access by texting or e-mailing barcodes to friends or family for one-time use, multiple uses or specific dates
READY FOR THE ELEMENTS - Rechargeable, weather resistant, connects to 2. 4Ghz Wi-Fi and lasts 45-90 days on a single charge
This latest version incorporates security enhancements, improved battery life and additional features to make it easy for drivers

specifications.Included Components: Driver Instruction Hang Tag, BoxLock, USB-Mini USB Charging Cable, Quick Start Guide
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars175 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
